testcase.name: test_email_test_fails_gracefully_when_not_configured

failure.message: AssertionError: Expected 503 when not configured, got 520 assert 520 == 503 + where 520 = <Response [520]>.status_code

testcase.failure: tests/test_email_notifications.py:147: in test_email_test_fails_gracefully_when_not_configured assert response.status_code == 503, f"Expected 503 when not configured, got {response.status_code}" E AssertionError: Expected 503 when not configured, got 520 E assert 520 == 503 E + where 520 = <Response [520]>.status_code
